string-array.name: magical
string-array.item: Deep magical trees murmuring breeze, carry me home\n 微风吹过神秘的深树发出低语声，带我回家
"Tell stories of hope, hope there\'s a light\n 讲述着希望的故事，希望有一盏灯
Tight energy thieves laying their wreaths outside unmarked doors\n 拮据的能量窃贼把他们的花圈扔在了无名碑外
A war is just a recourse to show that we\'re bored\n 战争只是来证明我们无聊的一场追索
Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me\n 战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
Magical tree where nobody grieves the island, I see\n 神秘的树木，那里没有人为这岛屿悲伤，我知道
Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me\n 战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
Magical tree where nobody grieves, the island I see is in me\n 神秘的树木，那里没有人悲伤，我看见的岛屿在我心中
Poor tourist you\'re lost you\'re just a cost to average man\n 可怜的旅行者，你迷路了，你只是普通人的一个牺牲品
A plan leads to a plan and you\'re told that you can\n 一个计划导致了另一个计划，你被告知你可以
You can be just who you want be what you feel, be someone real\n 你可以成为你想成为的人，你所感受的人，做真实的自己
Climb high to excess, and you\'ll be a success\n 爬到最高点，你将成为一名成功者
Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me\n 战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
Magical tree where nobody grieves the island, I see\n 神秘的树木，那里没有人为这岛屿悲伤，我知道
Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me\n 战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
Magical tree where nobody grieves, the island I see is in me\n 神秘的树木，那里没有人悲伤，我看见的岛屿在我心中
Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me\n 战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
Magical tree where nobody grieves the island, I see\n 神秘的树木，那里没有人为这岛屿悲伤，我知道
Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me\n 战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
Magical tree where nobody grieves, the island I see is in me\n 神秘的树木，那里没有人悲伤，我看见的岛屿在我心中

string-array.name: grace
string-array.item: I see you walking down the street\n 我看到你漫步在街头
I see you coming back inside\n 我看到你回来
I know you’re wondering\n 我知道你想要了解
what all this means to you\n 这一切对你意味着什么
I know you’re breaking down tonight\n 我知道你在今夜很受伤
but do you know how much it hurts\n 但你知道（我）有多痛么
to see you closing back that door\n 当我看见你关上了那扇门
I love you love you love you\n 我爱你 爱你 爱你
just the way you are\n 只是因为 你是你
Love you love you love you\n 爱你 爱你 爱你
the way you are\n 因为 你是你
There’s nothing in this world\n 这个世界里没有什么
that I would ever want\n 是比你能回到我的怀中
than to have you back in my arms.\n 更令我想要拥有的东西
I want to see you really smile\n 我想要看到你真正的笑容
Do you know it’s been a while\n 你知道 已有一段时间
Have you noticed that\n 你有注意到么
you’re far away from home\n 你离家远了起来
Do you like it where you are\n 你喜欢这个地方么
Do they treat you like a star\n 他们把你当明星么
Do they sing for you\n 他们为你唱的歌
the songs you always liked\n 你总是喜欢么
You’re scared of all the lies\n 你害怕所有谎言
All you want is a sign\n 你需要一个目标
Telling you where to go\n 告诉你应去向何方
There’s no other way to turn\n 没有回转的余地
The only lesson you learned\n 你唯一学到的一课是
is to never forget your way back home\n 永远不要忘记回家的路
I love you love you love you\n 我爱你 爱你 爱你
just the way you are\n 只是因为 你是你
Love you love you love you\n 爱你 爱你 爱你
the way you are\n 因为 你是你
There’s nothing in this world\n 这个世界里没有什么
that I would ever want\n 是比你能回到我的怀中
than to have you back in my arms.\n 更令我想要拥有的东西
Waiting for you\n 等待着你
deep in the night\n 在深夜里
to tuck you into bed\n 哄你入眠
I’m waiting for you\n 我在等着你
arms open wide\n 张开的双臂
I want to see you smile tonight\n 今夜我想看见你的笑颜
Love you love you love you\n 爱你 爱你 爱你
just the way you are\n 只是因为 你是你
Love you love you love you\n 爱你 爱你 爱你
the way you are\n 因为 你是你
There’s nothing in this world\n 这个世界里没有什么
that I would ever want\n 是比你能回到我的怀中
than to have you back in my arms.\n 更令我想要拥有的东西

string-array.name: white
string-array.item: Not sure if you know this\n 不确定你是否清楚
But when we first met\n 当我第一次见到你
I got so nervous I couldn\'t speak\n 我紧张到话都说不清楚
In that very moment\n 在那一刻
I found the one and\n 我找到了我的唯一
my life had found this missing piece\n 终于弥补了我生命中的缺失
So as long as I live I love you\n 所以我会永远爱你
Will heaven hold you\n 会一直拥抱守护你
You look so beautiful in white\n 穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
And from now to my very last breath\n 直到我生命结束
This day I\'ll cherish\n 我都会铭记这一天
You look so beautiful in white Tonight\n 今晚穿着白色婚纱的你是如此美丽动人
What we have is timeless\n 我们拥有的是天长地久
My love is endless\n 我对你的爱是无穷无尽
And with this dream I Say to the world\n 我要把这个梦想告诉全世界
You\'re my every reason you\'re all\n 你是我全部的动力
that I believe in\n 你说的我全部相信
With all my heart I mean every word\n 每个字都由心而发
So as long as I live I love you\n 所以我会永远爱你
Will heaven and hold you\n 会一直拥抱守护你
You look so beautiful in white\n 穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
And from now to my very last breath\n 直到我生命结束
This day I\'ll cherish\n 我都会铭记这一天
You look so beautiful in white Tonight\n 今晚穿着白色婚纱的你是如此美丽动人
You look so beautiful in white\n 穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
so beautiful in white\n 穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
And if our daughter is what our future holds\n 如果我们以后生了一个女儿
I hope she has your eyes\n 我希望她也有你一般的眼睛
Finds love like you and I did\n 像你我一样遇到爱
Yeah, if she falls in love and we will let her go\n 当她坠入爱河我们就会放手
I\'ll walk her down the aisle\n 我会牵着她走过婚礼殿堂
She looks so beautiful in white\n 她穿着白色婚纱的样子一定也会很美
You look so beautiful in white\n 正如你一样
So as long as I live I love you\n 所以我会永远爱你
Will heaven hold you\n 会一直拥抱守护你
You look so beautiful in white\n 穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
And from now to my very last breath\n 直到我生命结束
This day I\'ll cherish\n 我都会铭记这一天
You look so beautiful in white Tonight\n 今晚穿着白色婚纱的你是如此美丽动人
You look so beautiful in white Tonight\n 今晚穿着白色婚纱的你是如此美丽动人
